configuration.name: Instruction refill

configuration.name: Cycles
configuration.description: The number of core clock cycles

configuration.name: L2 miss

configuration.title: Cache
configuration.name: L1 miss

configuration.title: Clock
configuration.name: Cycles
configuration.description: The number of core clock cycles

configuration.title: Instruction
configuration.name: Executed
configuration.description: Counts the number of instructions going through the Register Renaming stage. This number is an approximate number of the total number of instructions speculatively executed, and even more approximate of the total number of instructions architecturally executed

configuration.title: Cache
configuration.name: Data refill
configuration.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a refill of at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

configuration.title: Cache
configuration.name: Data access
configuration.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a cache access to at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

configuration.title: Clock
configuration.name: Cycles
configuration.description: The number of core clock cycles

configuration.name: Receive
configuration.description: Receive network traffic, excluding effect from Streamline

configuration.title: Network
configuration.name: Transmit
configuration.description: Transmit network traffic, excluding effect from Streamline

configuration.name: System
configuration.description: Scheduler CPU Load of System Behavior

configuration.title: L2 Cache

configuration.description: Eviction, CastOut, of a line from the L2 cache
